name: City Spikes (Demo)
description:
Welcome to City spikes, a game where you have to dodge spikes to survive!

The controls are simple, just press SPACE to jump and avoid the spikes, but be careful as if you hit the ground the impact from your height wont end well.

(The game may have some bugs as this is just the demo, so please let me know if you find any)

The game is not fully finished, but it does include-

A controllable player, GAME OVER/ jumping sounds (Non-Copyright)  a score counter (no high score mark) that goes up to 9999, 7 different spike combinations and custom BG/Art.

This is the demo and I plan to Continue working on it until there are no bugs to be found. I will also be uploading a YouTube video a week/2 after this demo comes out on the development of the demo.

Link: N/A

Have fun!
